first_para: Gregg McClymont (born 3 June 1976) is a Scottish Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cumbernauld, Kilsyth and Kirkintilloch East since 2010.

full.extract:
Gregg McClymont (born 3 June 1976) is a Scottish Labour Party politician, who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Cumbernauld, Kilsyth and Kirkintilloch East since 2010.
^ "Who's Who". Ukwhoswho.com. Retrieved 2012-04-08.
full.title: Gregg McClymont
